meanings.definition: A person who solves crimes or mysteries with great skill and intelligence.
meanings.sent1: The young supersleuths uncovered the missing cat in record time.
meanings.sent2: The supersleuths gathered clues and cracked the case wide open.
meanings.sent3: The supersleuths found the hidden treasure map behind the sofa.
meanings.sent4: She was a supersleuth when it came to solving riddles at the party.
meanings.sent5: The supersleuths' keen eyes spotted the secret door in the old mansion.

meanings.definition: The group of detectives known for their exceptional investigative abilities.
meanings.sent1: Our favorite TV show features a team of supersleuths solving complex cases.
meanings.sent2: The supersleuths worked together to unravel the mystery of the stolen jewels.
meanings.sent3: The supersleuths accidentally mistook the janitor for the mastermind criminal.
meanings.sent4: The supersleuths' reputation as crime solvers spread far and wide.
meanings.sent5: In the world of fiction, supersleuths always outsmart the villains.
